comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: I was one of the first users of the Luno platform years ago before Binance later introduce Peer 2 Peer payment on its exchange, the fact is Luno wallet is a custodial wallet, you only need to log into the platform to access your crypto funds and assets. This is a bad practice for any crypto adopters in 2023, no doubt,  a bad practice it is. Wallets like Luno and Freewallet are missing users Private keys or recovery seeds, this mean that the team are the one keeping the keys for you, and this means that they have access to your funds, I believe this is not what you want OP. If you want a good Bitcoin wallet for your phone, download Electrum @ https://electrum.org/#download When you make enough money make sure you order for a hardware wallet, they are the most secured.
